titles.title: Your love, O Lord, it reaches to the heavens,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your love, O Lord, it reaches to the heavens,
Your faithfulness reaches to the stars,
Your righteousness is like a mighty mountain,
How priceless is Your faithful love!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will exalt You, O Lord,
I will exalt You, O Lord,
Praise Your holy name,
That my heart may sing to You,
I will exalt You, O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Your name, O Lord, it is a mighty tower,
Your glory, it covers all the earth
And in Your hands alone are strength and power,
All praise be to Your glorious name!
